QNCO.TA.summary: Y.Z. Queenco Ltd., through its subsidiaries, develops, owns, and operates entertainment centers and casinos in Greece, Cambodia, and Serbia. The company owns and operates four casinos, including Casino Loutraki located in Loutraki, and Casino Rodos located on the island of Rhodes in Greece; Casino Beograd in Belgrade, Serbia; and Queenco Casino in Sihanovill, Cambodia with a total number of 165 gaming tables and 1,380 slots machines. It also operates 2 hotels with approximately 300 hotels rooms and suites. The company is based in Bnei Brak, Israel.
